transArray.content: Although the room is a bit small, it is acceptable for a family of three. The service attitude at the front desk is very real. I was worried that it would be difficult for us to bring a 10-year-old child. I also offered to look at the room first before making a decision. But after checking in decisively, the child liked it very much, and the robot service was also very nice. It's a pity that I didn't take pictures .
